attributes.action: Free sanitary products available at chemists to anyone who may need them.
attributes.additional_details: Period products are a health need for everyone who has a period. They are expensive and people who cannot afford to pay should not be expected to risk their health. Contraception can be given for free so period products should be too.
attributes.background: Make period products available for free to those with a uterus in chemists. Perhaps in bundles which can be collected from any chemists or doctors office by anyone who needs them no questions asked.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584711
